price: (Saa Da no) obiara nni ntwitwagyeε ho tumi, gyesε obi a ͻne Ahummͻborͻ Hene no ayε apam (anaasε ͻne no ahyε bͻ).
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
